extension.description: Watch series and episodes from 3SK streaming service. This addon provides access to a wide variety of TV shows and series.
extension.disclaimer: The authors do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The authors have no affiliation with the content provider.
extension.news: v1.1.0 (2025-12-25) - Added real-time search functionality - Search results show episodes with automatic parent series detection - Selecting an episode from search navigates to full series page v1.0.0 (2025-12-24) - Initial release - Browse series catalog - View episode lists - Play episodes with stream resolution

extension.description: Watch Turkish series and shows from Turkish123. Features smart caching for fast playback, favorites, watch history, and resume positions.
extension.disclaimer: The authors do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The authors have no affiliation with the content provider.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2025-12-25) - Initial release - Browse series catalog - Smart 2-level caching (fast playback) - Search functionality - Favorites system - Watch history and continue watching - Resume playback positions - Auto-play next episode

extension.description:
Browse and watch Turkish series with beautiful TMDB metadata. Supports both Arabic (3SK) and English (Turkish123) audio.
üé¨ Features: - Popular Turkish Series - Currently Airing Shows - Discover New Series - Rich metadata (posters, descriptions, cast) - Dual audio support (Arabic/English) - Smart caching for instant playback
üì∫ Officially Supported: - Android TV - Linux (Ubuntu, Fedora, LibreELEC, OSMC) - Windows 7/10/11
Also works on: macOS, Fire TV, Raspberry Pi 3+
extension.disclaimer: This addon uses The Movie Database (TMDB) API but is not endorsed by TMDB. Content is streamed from third-party sources. The addon author is not responsible for the content.
extension.news:
v2.0.0 (2025-12-27) - üé¨ PHASE 2 COMPLETE: Actual video playback! - ‚úÖ 3SK Engine integrated (Arabic audio) - ‚úÖ Smart server index caching (24h) - ‚úÖ Episode search and mapping - ‚úÖ Multi-language name translation - ‚úÖ HLS streaming with anti-403 headers - ‚úÖ YOUR proven stream extraction logic - Ready for Turkish123 engine (Phase 2C)
v1.0.0 (2025-12-27) - Initial release (Phase 1) - Browse Turkish series from TMDB - Popular / Airing Now / Discover categories - Rich metadata integration

extension.summary: Universal Progress Tracker - Track your progress across all addons
extension.description: Automatically tracks playback progress for all videos in Kodi. Creates shortcuts for easy resume from Continue Watching menu. Works with any addon - no modifications needed!
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2026-01-03) - Initial release - Automatic playback tracking - Continue Watching menu with resume - Clean poster-based interface - Configurable settings with instant apply

extension.description: Repository for 3SK Video and other addons.

extension.summary: Turkish Series Player for TMDb Helper
extension.description:
High-performance player addon for Turkish series with multi-provider support.
üé¨ Features: - 3SK Engine (Arabic audio) - Multiple servers available - Qrmzi Engine (Arabic audio) - Forensically verified streams - Turkish123 Engine (English subtitles) - Direct access - Multi-provider stream selection dialog - Smart caching for instant playback - Optimized for Android TV - Multi-threaded stream resolution
üì∫ Use with TMDb Helper for best experience!
‚öôÔ∏è Configuration: Go to addon settings to enable/disable providers individually.

v1.2.0 (2026-01-16) - üéØ NEW: Multi-provider stream selection dialog! - ‚ú® NEW: Shows ALL streams from enabled providers - üè∑Ô∏è NEW: Stream labels show provider + audio type - üîß UPDATED: Qrmzi engine with forensic verification (matches qrmzi.py) - üåê UPDATED: Qrmzi base URL (www.qrmzi.tv) - ‚öôÔ∏è NEW: Individual provider toggles in settings - üìù IMPROVED: Stream format: [Provider] Name (Audio Type)

v1.1.0 (2026-01-16) - üéØ NEW: 3SK shows ALL episode matches - user chooses! - üîç NEW: Qrmzi forensic verification (Latin name matching) - ‚ö° FASTER: Multi-threaded Qrmzi resolution (5 workers) - ‚úÖ RELIABLE: No more wrong series matches - üé≠ Multi-provider fallback system
v1.0.0 (2026-01-16) - Initial release as TMDb Helper player

extension.summary: Little Tigre üêØ - Your Friendly Streaming Companion
extension.description: Little Tigre bridges TMDb Helper or any metadat addons to Stremio addons (Comet, Torrentio, MediaFusion, AIO Streams) with full anime support. Professional Router-Controller-Service architecture. Features: multi-debrid support (Real-Debrid, Torbox), Kitsu/MAL/AniList anime IDs, metadata persistence, color-coded streams, cached stream prioritization, smart filtering.
extension.news: v2.6.3 (2026-01-23) - FIXED: Corrupted settings.py and settings.xml - FIXED: Proper logger with Little Tigre branding

extension.description:
Little Fox - Your clever companion for Turkish series streaming!
Professional-grade player addon with multi-provider support and smart stream selection.
Architecture: - Providers: Scrape sites (3SK, Qrmzi, Turkish123, YouTube, EgyDead) - Resolvers: Extract streams (YouTube Piped API, ResolveURL) - Core: Orchestrate providers and resolvers - Player: Kodi 21 compatible playback - ID Translator: IMDb to TMDB translation
Features: - Interactive Selection Loop - Smart server retry with blocking error dialogs - Quality-based server ranking - Multi-provider support - YouTube via Piped API (HLS streams) - Auto-translate subtitles (Turkish to English) - Kodi 21 Omega compatible - Compatible with AIO Metadata, Seren, The Crew
ID Support: - TMDB ID: Direct usage (tmdb_id=12345) - IMDb ID: Auto-translation to TMDB (imdb_id=tt1234567) - Episode IMDb: Automatically finds parent series - In-Memory Cache: Fast repeated lookups
Configuration: - Enable/disable providers individually - Configure search mode (parallel/sequential) - Adjust timeouts and concurrency - Custom TMDB API key support
Compatible with AIO Metadata, TMDb Helper, Seren, The Crew!
extension.news:
v2.5.3 (2026-01-24) - Critical Fixes - FIXED: Python syntax errors (emoji only in strings now) - FIXED: Kodi 21 addon.xml compatibility - FIXED: Settings.xml warnings - Little Fox branding preserved
v2.5.2 (2026-01-24) - Little Fox Release - Rebranded to Little Fox - Fox-themed logging - Fixed AIO Metadata compatibility - Non-resolvable mode
v2.5.1 (2026-01-23) - IMDb ID Translation - IMDb to TMDB ID translator - Episode IMDb ID support - In-memory caching
v2.5.0 (2026-01-22) - Sub-Resolver Architecture - Sub-Resolver Pattern - YouTube Piped API resolver - Kodi 21 Omega compatibility

extension.summary: Little Racun - Bridge Stremio with Kodi
extension.description: Little Racun bridges the Stremio addon AIO Metadata (aiometadata.elfhosted.com) with Kodi, providing seamless access to multiple streaming catalogs and metadata sources. Supports TMDB, TVDB, MAL, Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+, and more. Integrates with Stremio Bridge, Fen Light, Otaku, and other Kodi players.
extension.news:
v2.1.0 (2026-01-23) - Rebranded to Little Racun ü¶ù - Player management in Settings - Download players from URL - View and delete players - Smart episode ID translation - On-demand IMDB/TMDB translation - Season folder grouping - Fast browsing (10x performance improvement)
v2.0.0 (2026-01-23) - Complete code refactor - modular architecture - Extended provider grouping (TMDB, TVDB, MAL, streaming) - 65% fewer menu entries with organized folders - Search functionality fixed - All features preserved and enhanced - Much more maintainable codebase
